docna.cdata!:
Paraguay - Second Road Maintenance Project :
            Loan 0652 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Paraguay - Second Road
            Maintenance Project : Loan 0652 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would consist of a
            four-year program (1970-73), for the continuation,
            improvement and expansion of maintenance operations on
            national roads. The program would be implemented with the
            assistance of consultants and would include the purchase of
            maintenance, shop and other equipment, the expansion and
            improvement of workshops and training of local personnel.
